basic_rock.Name: Rock
basic_rock.Description: A basic rock. Deals 6 damage on win.

basic_paper.Name: Paper
basic_paper.Description: A basic paper. Deals 6 damage on win.

basic_scissors.Name: Scissors
basic_scissors.Description: Basic scissors. Deals 6 damage on win.

super_scissors.Name: Super Scissors
super_scissors.Description: Deals 5 damage for each Scissors attribute you have equipped.

safety_scissors.Name: Safety Scissors
safety_scissors.Description: Blocks 3 damage when you lose. Deals 6 damage on win.

stone_shield.Name: Stone Shield
stone_shield.Description: Blocks 4 damage when you lose. Deals 5 damage on win.

vampire_scissors.Name: Vampire Scissors
vampire_scissors.Description: Deals 8 damage on win. Heals for 50% of damage dealt.

iron_ball.Name: Iron Ball
iron_ball.Description: A heavy iron ball. Deals 9 damage on win. Has double Rock synergy.

origami.Name: Origami
origami.Description: Folded paper art. Deals 5-15 damage on win. Has both Paper and Scissors synergy.

shale.Name: Shale
shale.Description: Fragile rock. Takes 2x damage from rock, 0.5x from scissors. Breaks into Shale Shards if hit by rock or paper.

shale_shards.Name: Shale Shards
shale_shards.Description: Broken shale fragments. Deals 2x damage to paper and scissors. Takes 2x damage from rock.

uranium.Name: Uranium
uranium.Description: Radioactive rock. Deals no damage but applies 1 radioactive counter (deals 1 damage per turn per stack).

grievances_letter.Name: Grievances Letter
grievances_letter.Description: Stores damage taken when you lose. Releases all stored damage on your next win.
